#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<stack>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<queue>
#include<set>
#include<list>
#define pb(x) push_back(x);
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc(x) putchar_unlocked(x);
#define inf 1<<30
#define mod 1000000007

using namespace std;

typedef pair<int,int> pii;

long long int abso(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a<b)
		return b-a;
	else
		return a-b;
}

long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a<b)
		swap(a,b);
	long long int r;
	while(b!=0)
	{
		r=a;
		a=b;
		b=r%b;
	}
	return a;
}

int main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		int arr[n+1];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>arr[i];
		sort(arr,arr+n);
		int i=0,j=n-1;
		if(n==1)
			cout<<arr[0]<<endl;
		else
		{
			while(j>i)
			{
				cout<<arr[j]<<" ";
				j--;
				if(j==i)
					cout<<arr[i]<<endl;
				else
					cout<<arr[i]<<" ";
				i++;
			}
			if(j==i)
				cout<<arr[j]<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
